CHAT.comment: PHILLIP T. BREUER, Petitioner v. JIM'S CONCRETE OF BREVARD.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:07 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD E. PINAUD, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW S. HAMENT ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LISA S. BLATT ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DONALD E. PINAUD, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 10:54 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
